source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, my friends─now that we have all settled back into our bodies, it is time we resumed our duties in earnest. Let us speak of our plans.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien, tout le monde a eu le temps de se remettre sur pied<var 1D /var>? J'aimerais que nous discutions de ce que nous allons faire à partir de maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000020_THANCRED<tab>Ever since the Emperor's death, it's been one unsettling rumor after another. I've a mind to pay a visit to Garlemald to ascertain the truth of the matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000020_THANCRED<tab>En ce qui me concerne, je voudrais garder un œil sur Garlemald. J'ai entendu toutes sortes de rumeurs depuis notre retour et je pense qu'une inspection discrète de la capitale s'impose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000030_URIANGER<tab>A prudent endeavor. 'Tis of the essence that we establish the full extent of the threat. Not least if it should prove that Zenos doth indeed orchestrate events from the shadows.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000030_URIANGER<tab>C'est une bonne idée, il nous faut déterminer exactement quel genre de menace les Impériaux re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tent... Et ce que manigance Zenos depuis qu'il est revenu d'entre les morts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000040_URIANGER<tab>In light of which possibility, I shall accompany thee on thy mission.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000040_URIANGER<tab>Je vous accompagnerai. Ce sera plus prudent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000050_URIANGER<tab>Be assured that thou shalt find me more a help than a hindrance. Thou requirest another to imbue thine ammunition, dost thou not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000050_URIANGER<tab>Ne vous inquiétez pas, je ne vais pas vous gêner, au contraire. Après tout, vous aurez bien besoin de charger vos cartouches en éther, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000051_YSHTOLA<tab>For DE and FR only. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000051_YSHTOLA<tab>※独・仏、アドリブ用ラベル1

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000060_ALISAIE<tab>Assuming that's settled, there's something I've been meaning to look into as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000060_ALISAIE<tab>Alors c'est décidé pour vous deux. Pour ma part, il y a quelque chose que j'aimerais faire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000070_LYSE<tab>Welcome back, everyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000070_LYSE<tab>Bonjour tout le monde<var 1D /var>! Quel plaisir de vous voir debout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse<var 1D /var>! Tu nous as tant manqué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000090_LYSE<tab>You're fine now, right? No more headaches or keeling over?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000090_LYSE<tab>Vous êtes tous revenus pour de bon<var 1D /var>? Pas de risque de vous voir tomber dans les pommes à nouveau<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000100_ALISAIE<tab>That's right. We're fighting fit, and raring to go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000100_ALISAIE<tab>J'espère bien que non. Comme tu peux le voir, on est tous en pleine forme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000110_GRAHATIA<tab>The famous Lyse Hext...former Scion and hero of the Ala Mhigan Resistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000110_GRAHATIA<tab>Lyse...<var 1D /var>? Ce serait donc elle qui a combattu avec les Héritiers au sein de l'arrrmée de libération...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000120_LYSE<tab>I don't believe we've met.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000120_LYSE<tab>Euh... Et vous êtes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000130_KRILE<tab>Really? It's so easy to assume that all Archons are acquainted. But then I suppose your fields of expertise <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> rather different.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000130_KRILE<tab>Tiens, vous ne vous êtes jamais rencontrés<var 1D /var>? Enfin, ce n'est pas si étonnant. Même entre Sharlayanais, on a rarement l'occasion de se croiser si nos sujets d'étude sont différents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000140_GRAHATIA<tab>G'raha Tia, at your service. I have read much and more about your exploits, Commander. It is a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000140_GRAHATIA<tab>Je suis G'raha Tia, nouveau membre des Héritiers. J'ai beaucoup entendu... ou plutôt lu à propos de tes exploits, c'est un honneur de te rrrencontrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000150_LYSE<tab>Likewise. The others told me all about you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000150_LYSE<tab>Ah... Merci. Lyse Hext, enchantée. J'ai déjà entendu parler de toi aussi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do not be so sure. Words scarcely do justice to the vital role he played in our victory in the First. A more dependable comrade one would be hard-pressed to find.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000160_ALPHINAUD<tab>G'raha Tia nous a été d'une aide précieuse dans le premier reflet. C'est une vraie mine de savoir, et on peut compter sur lui en toute situation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000170_LYSE<tab>Ah, right, I did glance at the report...but I'd be lying if I said I understood half of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000170_LYSE<tab>Ah mais oui<var 1D /var>! J'ai survolé le rapport sur ce qui vous est arrivé là-bas, et j'avoue ne pas avoir compris grand-chose...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000180_LYSE<tab>Well, well...that's a lot to take in. Um... Just to be clear, this means we're <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> heading for another calamity, does it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000180_LYSE<tab>Alors vous avez traversé l'espace et le temps pour atterrir dans un autre monde... Quelle histoire incroyable<var 1D /var>! Si j'ai bien compris, nous n'avons donc plus à craindre de nouveau fléau<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000190_URIANGER<tab>Shorn of their unsundered masters' leadership, what Ascians remain shall struggle to see their plans to fruition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000190_URIANGER<tab>Les Asciens transmigrés n'ont pas tous été défaits. Toutefois, sans les originels pour les rallier, ils ne devraient pas constituer une menace importante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000200_URIANGER<tab>And though I would ever advise caution, I believe we may rest easy for a time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000200_URIANGER<tab>Nous devrons rester vigilants, bien sûr, mais il ne pèse a priori plus aucune menace immédiate sur nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000210_LYSE<tab>I'll take that as a yes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000210_LYSE<tab>Enfin une bonne nouvelle...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000220_LYSE<tab>Even so, I don't know what to make of this business about Hydaelyn and Zodiark being primals...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000220_LYSE<tab>Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que Hydaelyn et Zordiarche soient des Primordiaux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000230_YSHTOLA<tab>A difficult truth to bear, yes. But at last we understand the nature of our adversary. And if there are no further calamities, neither will there be Rejoinings, meaning Zodiark will never regain His full strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000230_YSHTOLA<tab>Sans nouveau fléau, la réunification des reflets est impossible. Zordiarche ne peut donc récupérer toute sa puissance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000240_YSHTOLA<tab>Even so, as the oldest and mightiest of primals, He remains a force to be feared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000240_YSHTOLA<tab>Cependant, même incomplet, il reste le plus ancien et le plus puissant des Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>Though His is a power born of the desire for salvation, we have seen the havoc it may wreak. And it falls to us to ensure that it is never again brought to bear upon this star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>Emet-Selch nous a confié l'avenir de ce monde, alors c'est à nous de faire en sorte que Zordiarche ne puisse être utilisé à des fins néfastes. Après tout, il a été créé pour arrêter l'apocalypse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000260_ALPHINAUD<tab>But tell us, Lyse, to what do we owe the pleasure of your visit?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais dis-nous, pourquoi es-tu venue jusqu'ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000270_LYSE<tab>What do you mean? Isn't seeing my long-lost comrades reason enough? ...All right, there <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> one other matter. I have a message from the Alliance. And before you ask, yes, it's about the Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000270_LYSE<tab>Oh non<var 1D /var>! Avec toutes ces émotions, j'ai failli oublier le but premier de ma visite<var 1D /var>! J'apporte un message de l'Alliance éorzéenne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000280_LYSE<tab>So, after Emperor Varis's assassination, it seems his cousin “Nerva” made a bid for the throne.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000280_LYSE<tab>C'est à propos de Garlemald... Après la mort de Varis, son cousin Nerva s'est autoproclamé Empereur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000290_LYSE<tab>The trouble is, he wasn't the only one with designs on it, and it didn't take long for a civil war to break out. And it's not just in the provinces. Early reports say huge swathes of the imperial capital have been reduced to rubble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000290_LYSE<tab>Seulement, il s'est heurté à une opposition farouche, et la situation a vite dégénéré en guerre civile. On raconte que la capitale n'est plus qu'un champ de ruines...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000300_LYSE<tab>The Alliance will soon convene in Ala Mhigo to decide on a course of action, and we were hoping you'd come along.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000300_LYSE<tab>Les membres de l'Alliance ont décidé de se réunir à Ala Mhigo pour en discuter, et ils souhaiteraient que les Héritiers se joignent à leur table.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000310_THANCRED<tab>Well! As it happens, Urianger and I were just this moment planning a little trip to Garlemald. And we should be grateful for any advice the Alliance can provide on how best to make the most of our visit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000310_THANCRED<tab>Ça tombe bien, nous venions de décider d'infiltrer l'Empire pour savoir ce qu'il se trame à l'intérieur de ses frontières. Tout ren<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ment est bon à prendre avant notre départ.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000320_ALPHINAUD<tab>To Ala Mhigo, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000320_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien, c'est décidé, nous irons à Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000330_ALISAIE<tab>Why don't you go on without me. There's something I need to look into.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000330_ALISAIE<tab>Désolée, mais... est-ce que je suis obligée d'y aller, moi aussi<var 1D /var>? Comme je disais, j'ai déjà quelque chose en tête...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, forgive me, you were just telling us. What is it, if I may ask?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah oui, pardon. Tu étais d'ailleurs sur le point nous dire de quoi il s'agit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000350_ALISAIE<tab>I want to find a way to cure the tempered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000350_ALISAIE<tab>Oui. E-en fait... je voudrais trouver un remède contre la subjugation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course. You think it may be possible to adapt the treatment you used to help those corrupted by the sin eaters...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je vois... Tu souhaites mettre à profit la méthode que nous avons employée pour soigner les victimes des purgateurs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000370_LYSE<tab>I'm sorry? A cure for tempering? But that would change everything! Alisaie─consider yourself uninvited. Go and find us this cure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000370_LYSE<tab>Guérir la subjugation<var 1D /var>? Ce serait fantastique<var 1D /var>! Tu devrais te concentrer sur ça en priorité<var 1D /var>! De toute façon, vous n'avez pas besoin d'assister à la réunion au complet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000380_ALISAIE<tab>I'll do my best.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000380_ALISAIE<tab>Merci, Lyse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000390_ALISAIE<tab>I was hoping you might join me. Don't worry if not, though─I won't hold it against you if you'd rather attend a stuffy meeting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000390_ALISAIE<tab>Dis, tu voudrais bien m'aider<var 1D /var>? Enfin, à moins que tu ne préfères les tables rondes politiques... Comme tu veux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What meeting? Lead on!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pas de problème, je viens avec toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>like<var 1A 01 /var> stuffy meetings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'aimerais assister à la réunion de l'Alliance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000400_ALISAIE<tab>I knew you'd say yes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000400_ALISAIE<tab>Merci, je savais que je pouvais compter sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000410_YSHTOLA<tab>Rest assured there'll be many, many more. Go on, lend Alisaie a hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000410_YSHTOLA<tab>Ce n'est pas très gentil de laisser Alisaie en plan comme ça. Moi qui croyais que ton cœur d'<var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var> te guidait vers l'inconnu... Tu devrais l'accompagner pour lui prêter main-forte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000420_GRAHATIA<tab>I'll come too! ...If you don't mind, that is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000420_GRAHATIA<tab>Dans ce cas, laissez-moi me joindrrre à vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000421_YSHTOLA<tab>For DE and FR only. Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000421_YSHTOLA<tab>※独・仏、アドリブ用ラベル2

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>Mind? I'm sure they would be glad of your company. Pray enjoy your time together with your hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>Pas la peine d'en faire des tonnes, personne ne te retiendra, tu sais. Allez, pars à l'aventure avec ton idole<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000440_GRAHATIA<tab>My...? N-No, that's not─ I mean, I— I-I simply thought my knowledge might be of some use!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000440_GRAHATIA<tab>Mais<var 1D /var>! C'est pas pour ça que... Ahem, je voulais dirrre que mon expérience du premier reflet pourrait s'avérer utile, c'est tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>We shall be on our way, then. Godsspeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien, il est temps de partir pour Ala Mhigo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000460_AYMERIC<tab>My friend. After the disappointment of not seeing you in Ala Mhigo, what good fortune to chance upon you here of all places.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000460_AYMERIC<tab>Je pensais vous revoir à la réunion de l'Alliance, mais finalement c'est ici que nos chemins se croisent à nouveau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000470_AYMERIC<tab>As you may have heard, the allied nations are making a renewed effort to address the primal problem.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000470_AYMERIC<tab>Vous avez sûrement dû en entendre parler, mais chacune des Cités membres de l'Alliance a engagé une nouvelle politique concernant les tribus d'hommes-bêtes et leurs Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000480_AYMERIC<tab>To that end have I invited the chieftain of the Vanu to Ishgard, that we might together plot a course.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000480_AYMERIC<tab>C'est pour cela que j'ai invité le sage des Vanu Vanu ici à Ishgard, afin de discuter de notre avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000490_AYMERIC<tab>Since the war with the Empire appears to be nearing its conclusion, I would also like to call upon Estinien's lance. Alas, he is as ever a difficult man to find.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000490_AYMERIC<tab>La guerre contre l'Empire touche à sa fin... J'aimerais qu'Estinien soit à nos côtés afin de nous assurer la victoire, mais il reste toujours aussi insaisissable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000500_AYMERIC<tab>I am informed he recently paid a visit to the Rising Stones. Should he happen to do so again, be sure to pass on my regards, won't you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000500_AYMERIC<tab>Il s'est rendu au Refuge des roches il y a peu, non<var 1D /var>? Si jamais il décide d'y repasser, dites-lui que j'aimerais le voir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000510_AYMERIC<tab>But tell me, what business brings you to our fair city this day?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000510_AYMERIC<tab>Mais au fait, qu'est-ce qui vous amène dans notre cité<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000520_AYMERIC<tab>A cure for tempering... You never cease to amaze me. Until now, our only hope has been prevention, our every failure irrevocable. But this─this would rewrite the rules of engagement. It could end the cycle of bloodshed...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000520_AYMERIC<tab>Un remède contre la subjugation... Les Héritiers ont décidément toujours de la suite dans les idées<var 1D /var>! Une invention aussi miraculeuse serait un atout dans notre lutte contre les Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000530_AYMERIC<tab>Very well. You shall have all the ceruleum we can provide─and an airship with which to transport it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000530_AYMERIC<tab>Si tel est votre but, la manufacture de Cielacier vous fournira tout le céruleum nécessaire à vos recherches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000540_AYMERIC<tab>In this matter, you may count on Ishgard's full support.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000540_AYMERIC<tab>Vous pourrez utiliser l'un de nos aéronefs pour le transporter. Ce n'est pas grand-chose, mais... je serais heureux d'apporter ma pierre à l'édifice.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000550_ALISAIE<tab>Who would have thought ceruleum weighed so much?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000550_ALISAIE<tab>(soupire)... Je suis usée<var 1D /var>! Qui aurait cru que c'était si lourd, un baril de céruleum<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000560_ALISAIE<tab>Serves me right for being stubborn, I suppose. I should have just done what you did and accepted help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000560_ALISAIE<tab>Toi par contre, tu t'es fait livrer aux frais de la princesse. J'aurais dû en faire autant, au lieu de me montrer aussi têtue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000570_CID<tab>Good work, you two. This is all we asked for and more. Quite a lot more, now that I look at it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000570_CID<tab>Te voilà<var 1D /var>! Merci pour le coup de main avec le céruleum. On dirait même qu'il y en a plus que prévu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000580_CID<tab>Lord Aymeric, eh? And entirely by chance? Hah! Some people have all the luck.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000580_CID<tab>Je comprends mieux... En tout cas l'aide d'Aymeric tombe à pic<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000590_GRAHATIA<tab>We have also succeeded in configuring the terminals─thanks in no small part to our able assistant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000590_GRAHATIA<tab>On vient tout juste de terminer les préparatifs. Ça n'a pas été simple, mais heurrreusement, nous avons pu compter sur un allié précieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000600_NERO<tab>It's been a while, hero. You seem surprised to see me. Lest you misunderstand, I've no interest in such things as cures for tempering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000600_NERO<tab>Hé, salut toi. Ça faisait longtemps<var 1D /var>! Ces histoires de subjugués ne me font ni chaud ni froid, mais je ne voulais pas manquer une occasion de dépasser les limites d'Allag<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000610_NERO<tab>But if you mean to achieve that which eluded even the storied Allagans, it seemed plain that you would require my expertise. And so it proved. Is that not right, Garlond?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000610_NERO<tab>De toute façon, ils ne seraient arrivés à rien sans moi, ces deux-là<var 1D /var>! Pas vrai, Garlond<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000620_CID<tab>Ask Jessie. She was the one who hired you. All I know is you're an employee of the Ironworks now, so you'll bloody well earn your keep.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000620_CID<tab>Même si c'est Jessie qui a pris la liberté de te recruter, je te rappelle que tu es mon employé. Alors bosse un peu au lieu de cabotiner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000630_CID<tab>For all the effort it took to track you down after your latest disappearing act, you could find the cure for death and it wouldn't be worth the trouble.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000630_CID<tab>De bien belles paroles pour un homme qui s'en va sans mot dire en laissant une note de frais longue comme le bras. Avec le mal qu'on a eu à te retrouver, tu as intérêt à mériter ta paye<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000640_NERO<tab>Ahem. That wasn't the <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> reason I agreed to cooperate. I am reliably informed that Garlond and I are destined to unravel the secrets of travel not only across dimensions, but through time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000640_NERO<tab>J'ai d'autres raisons d'être ici. Il paraît que nos alter ego du futur auraient percé le secret du voyage à travers le temps et les dimensions...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000650_NERO<tab>Doubtless the lion's share of the credit lies with me─nine parts to Garlond's one. And this research will be a stepping-stone to that illustrious achievement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000650_NERO<tab>Hmpf... Enfin, je suis certain que le mérite me revient en majorité. Et comme je n'ai pas l'intention de me faire doubler, même par moi-même, j'ai décidé de me joindre à vos recherches.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000660_CID<tab>Very well, then. I'll do a tenth of the work. Just the part that's beyond you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000660_CID<tab>Tu sais, même si mon autre moi n'a fait qu'une petite partie du travail, ça signifie malgré tout que ma présence t'est in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000670_NERO<tab>Whatever you say, Garlond.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000670_NERO<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Si ça te rassure de le penser...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000680_CID<tab>By the way, the healing applications of crystal foci proved very useful in getting us to where we are now. I must remember to thank Mikoto.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000680_CID<tab>Tu te souviens de cette gemme de scrutation qu'on a utilisée en Bozja<var 1D /var>? Pour réaliser notre projet, je me suis largement inspiré des méthodes de Mikoto. Il faut dire qu'elle a un véritable don pour l'éthérologie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000690_CID<tab>Right! If everyone's ready, let's begin!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000690_CID<tab>Bien... Puisque tout est prêt, nous allons pouvoir commencer la simulation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000700_CID<tab>All appears to be in order. Now we just have to wait for it to find us our magick. Why not take this opportunity to put your feet up? This may take a while...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000700_CID<tab>Le dispositif a démarré comme prévu... Il ne reste plus qu'à attendre qu'il trouve la bonne formule pour le sort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000710_CID<tab>Damn it. It's overloading!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000710_CID<tab>Raaah...<var 1D /var>! Le calcul dépasserait les limites de la machine<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000720_WEDGE<tab>Chief! She won't last much longer!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000720_WEDGE<tab>Patroooon<var 1D /var>! Si on intervient pas, ça va nous péter à la figure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000730_CID<tab>We'll have to shut it down!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000730_CID<tab>Merde<var 1D /var>! Pas le choix, il faut l'arrêter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000740_GRAHATIA<tab>Wait! We're close! So very close!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000740_GRAHATIA<tab>Attendez encore un peu<var 1D /var>! Je crois qu'on y est prrresque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000750_CID<tab>No subtitles, report if shown.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000750_CID<tab>Argh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000760_NERO<tab>Well, this is going swimmingly...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000760_NERO<tab>Ouh là, ça sent le roussi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000770_GRAHATIA<tab>Please, a moment longer! I beg you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000770_GRAHATIA<tab>Allez, tiens bon... Encorrre un peu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000780_GRAHATIA<tab>There!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000780_GRAHATIA<tab>Ça y est<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>No subtitles, report if shown.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>Haaa... Ha ha... (soupire puis ricanement)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000800_GRAHATIA<tab>I was able to memorize the magick before it faded. It still needs to be put to the proof, but...I believe we have our cure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000800_GRAHATIA<tab>Vous en faites pas. J'ai mémorisé la formule avant qu'elle disparaisse. Avec ça, je suis cerrrtain qu'on va pouvoir guérir la subjugation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000810_WEDGE<tab>It's just as well. She'll never run again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000810_WEDGE<tab>Rien à faire... Il est bon pour la casse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000820_GRAHATIA<tab>The fault is mine. I'm sorry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000820_GRAHATIA<tab>Désolé... C'est ma faute.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000830_CID<tab>Don't be. It may fall short of dimension-hopping, but a cure for tempering is not to be sniffed at.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000830_CID<tab>T'en fais pas pour ça<var 1D /var>! Même s'il n'est pas aussi ré<var 16 /var>vo<var 16 /var>lu<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nai<var 16 /var>re que le voyage spatio-temporel, ce remède a le potentiel de changer le monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000840_CID<tab>This, my friend, is a world-changing discovery. One we're proud to have had a hand in. A few magitek terminals are a pittance to pay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000840_CID<tab>Ce terminal magitek n'est qu'un maigre prix à payer pour contribuer au nouveau futur que vous allez façonner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000850_GRAHATIA<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000850_GRAHATIA<tab>Merrrci...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000860_CID<tab>Well, we've done what we can. The rest is up to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000860_CID<tab>Bon, je crois que c'est tout ce qu'on peut faire de notre côté. On vous confie la suite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000870_MAELSTROMOFFICER<tab>Apologies for the wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000870_MAELSTROMOFFICER<tab>Désolée pour l'attente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000880_ALISAIE<tab>Ga Bu. Have you been good?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000880_ALISAIE<tab>Alors Ga Bu, tu n'as pas fait de bêtises pendant mon absence<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000890_GABU<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000890_GABU<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000900_MAELSTROMOFFICER<tab>Still no change, I'm afraid. He just stands there in silence until we move him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000900_MAELSTROMOFFICER<tab>Son état n'a pas changé. Toujours aussi calme et silencieux, comme la dernière fois que vous êtes venus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000910_ALISAIE<tab>It's all right now. We're going to help you get better.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000910_ALISAIE<tab>Ne t'en fais pas, je vais te guérir, je te le promets<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fancy meeting you here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000920_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tiens, le hasard fait bien les choses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000930_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud! Y'shtola! I thought you were attending to primal matters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000930_ALISAIE<tab>Comme on se retrouve<var 1D /var>! Vous ne deviez pas aider la Cité à établir une nouvelle politique anti-Primordiaux<var 1D /var>? Vous avez déjà fini<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000940_YSHTOLA<tab>We were, and came here for a meeting on the subject. Certain pirate factions did not deign to attend, however, and it was canceled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000940_YSHTOLA<tab>Nous nous sommes ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment rendus à l'assemblée de Limsa Lominsa, mais certains pirates ne se sont pas présentés. Finalement, la session a été reportée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000950_ALPHINAUD<tab>We had resigned ourselves to having wasted a journey when we chanced to espy you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous étions sur le point de repartir pour le Refuge des roches quand nous vous avons aperçus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Could it be that there has been progress with the treatment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si vous êtes avec Ga Bu, cela signifie que le fameux remède est au point<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Using magitek terminals to formulate the solution... I would never have contemplated such an approach.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vous avez utilisé un terminal magitek pour calculer la formule exacte... C'est un procédé pour le moins novateur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000980_YSHTOLA<tab>So this new magick, adapted from memory transference, would be used to purge the subject of their fanatical faith, while Angelo would be responsible for reanimating the aether of their soul... Hm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000980_YSHTOLA<tab>Je comprends... Vous ravivez l'âme du patient grâce aux soins du porxie, puis utilisez un sort d'altération de mémoire afin d'atténuer sa foi aveugle. D'un point de vue purement éthérologique, ça se tient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet I wonder at the practicalities. If one were to reanimate the soul first, it would only serve to exacerbate the tempering. Conversely, a stagnant soul would not respond to the effects of the magick.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_000990_YSHTOLA<tab>Le problème, c'est que raviver son âme trop vite pourrait renforcer son adoration envers le Primordial. Et à l'inverse, votre sort n'aurait que peu d'effet sur une âme inactive...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>Would both need to be performed simultaneously?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>Il faut donc procéder aux deux opérations simultanément, je me trompe<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001010_GRAHATIA<tab>Nothing escapes Master Matoya's inquiring eye! As you say, both must be carried out simultaneously, and thus I propose to imbue Angelo with the tempering treatment in much the same manner as I did the spirit vessels.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001010_GRAHATIA<tab>Je rrreconnais bien là la grande Matoya. Il nous faut en effet insuffler un nouveau sort dans notre porxie, un peu comme lorsqu'on a amélioré les conducteurs spirituels.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001020_ALISAIE<tab>By doing so, we also spare G'raha the trouble of casting spell after spell. It's really rather efficient.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001020_ALISAIE<tab>Et grâce à ça, Angelo pourra lancer les deux sorts en même temps. Ce sera plus efficace, et ça t'épargnera bien des efforts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001030_GRAHATIA<tab>Be that as it may, certain difficulties are unavoidable: the imbuing process will still require no small amount of aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001030_GRAHATIA<tab>Ça ne sera pas aisé pour autant. Il va nous falloir une grrrande quantité d'énergie magique pour insuffler un nouveau sort dans le porxie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001040_GRAHATIA<tab>And as I can no longer draw upon the Crystal Tower's stores of energy, I will be compelled to rely on those of others.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001040_GRAHATIA<tab>Autrefois, j'aurais pu m'aider de la Tour de Cristal, mais maintenant, mes pouvoirs sont bien plus limités... Je vais avoirrr besoin d'aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, I for one would be glad to assist.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas, je pense que Y'shtola et moi-même pouvons te donner un coup de main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001060_YSHTOLA<tab>As would I. Since the resumption of our duties, it has been naught but stuffy meetings, and I have ample aether to spare.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001060_YSHTOLA<tab>Oui, avec plaisir. À force de participer à des réunions, j'ai de l'énergie à revendre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001070_GRAHATIA<tab>Excellent. With your permission, then, let us begin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001070_GRAHATIA<tab>Merrrci. Dans ce cas, mettons-nous au travail tout de suite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001080_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes, this will do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001080_GRAHATIA<tab>Bien, c'est assez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001090_GRAHATIA<tab>And now it's my turn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001090_GRAHATIA<tab>Je vais maintenant insuffler le sorrrt dans le porxie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001100_GRAHATIA<tab>'Tis done...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001100_GRAHATIA<tab>Haaa... Haaa... Ça devrait faire l'affairrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001110_ALPHINAUD<tab>“No small amount,” indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je n'aurais jamais cru que ce serait aussi difficile...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001120_GRAHATIA<tab>Well...we seek to go where even the Allagans did not. It was never like to be easy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001120_GRAHATIA<tab>Ce que nous essayons... d'accomplir... même les Allagois... n'y sont jamais parvenus... Tu croyais que ça serait... une partie de plaisirrr<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001130_GRAHATIA<tab>The rest is up to you, Alisaie. The treatment itself will take time and focus, so we will need a quiet room. I'm sure our hosts can spare one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001130_GRAHATIA<tab>À toi de jouer maintenant, Alisaie. Tu vas devoir investir encore plus de temps et d'énergie que moi... Allons dans un des salons privés de l'Amirrrale pour être au calme.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001140_GRAHATIA<tab>I will go with her. It may be a while before we return, so I would ask for your patience...and your faith.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001140_GRAHATIA<tab>Je vais l'accompagner. Toi et les autres, attendez dehors et crrroisez les doigts.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001150_ALISAIE<tab>We'll bring Ga Bu back. You see if we don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001150_ALISAIE<tab>Allons-y<var 1D /var>! Quoi qu'il arrive, je soignerai Ga Bu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001160_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twould seem our part is played. Let us find a place to recuperate while we wait for news.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Attendons-les un peu plus loin. Je suis sûr que tout se passera bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001170_ALPHINAUD<tab>For years, Eorzea has labored to find a solution to the primal problem, without success. Any hope that tempering could be reversed faded long ago.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce remède contre la subjugation... S'il fonctionne, ce sera une vraie révolution en Éorzéa. Surtout après tant d'années de lutte contre les Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001180_ALPHINAUD<tab>I myself had given it up as impossible─given up on the tempered and the Light-corrupted alike. They were problems to be tolerated, or else eliminated, I believed, and to think otherwise was pure naivety. Childishness, even.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001180_ALPHINAUD<tab>En toute honnêteté, je pensais que le destin des subjugués était scellé, tout comme celui des victimes de purgateurs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001190_ALPHINAUD<tab>But Alisaie refused to give up. She struggled, and she struggled...and her efforts were rewarded with a way to bring back Halric. And now countless others may no longer be beyond salvation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je croyais qu'on ne pouvait que les abandonner à leur triste sort. Alisaie, quant à elle, n'a jamais renoncé, ni pour Halric ni pour Ga Bu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>However much we bicker, I have the greatest respect for my sister. Had I half her stubbornness─nay, her <var 1A 02 /var>unwillingness<var 1A 01 /var> to accept the status quo, I would be a far better person. A far better Scion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je suis vraiment en admiration devant sa ténacité à toute épreuve, c'est une chose qu'il me manque encore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Well, if it's any consolation, she's in awe of your work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Alisaie t'admire aussi, tu sais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Don't tell me, tell her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Peut-être devrais-tu lui dire, plutôt qu'à moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001210_ALPHINAUD<tab>She told you of my graduation thesis? How very...embarrassing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je vois... Vous avez discuté de nos mémoires de fin d'études. C'est un peu embarrassant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nonetheless, it is comforting─and not a little surprising─to hear that I'm still capable of impressing my sister. On the rare occasions I'm not annoying her, that is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais cela me rassure de savoir que je suis parfois un bon frère. J'ai souvent l'impression que nous ne faisons qu'enchaîner les disputes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001230_ALPHINAUD<tab>I should, I know. Yet despite my good intent, I have the feeling that I would only succeed in incurring her ire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ha ha, c'est vrai. Mais j'ai bien peur de m'attirer ses foudres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001240_ALPHINAUD<tab>A-Alisaie, tout va bien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001250_YSHTOLA<tab>The treatment─did it work?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001250_YSHTOLA<tab>Alors, comment ça s'est passé...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001260_GABU<tab>I'm so glad to see you all! Delighted, happy, glad!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001260_GABU<tab>Alphinaud<var 1D /var>! Tout le monde est là<var 1D /var>! Youpi, youpi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ga Bu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ga Bu<var 1D /var>! Tu peux parler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001280_GABU<tab>All this time, my mind was filled with thoughts of Great Father Titan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001280_GABU<tab>Depuis ce jour-là, Titan arrêtait pas de gronder dans ma tête, bam bam bam...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001290_GABU<tab>But I never forgot about Mother and Father. Always, they were in my heart. Constantly, ever, always.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001290_GABU<tab>Mais j'ai jamais oublié mon papa et ma maman, jamais jamais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001300_GABU<tab>So I tried to focus on their faces. Theirs and yours. Alisaie's and everyone's. And I found that I could remember. One thing, then another, and another!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001300_GABU<tab>Je me suis battu de toutes mes forces pour pas écouter Titan<var 1D /var>! Tous les jours, je pensais à Alisaie et à mes amis qui m'ont aidé, oui, oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001310_GRAHATIA<tab>Your hopes reached Ga Bu. They helped him to hold on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001310_GRAHATIA<tab>Malgré son état, la bienveillance d'Alisaie et de vous autres l'a aidé à préserrrver sa conscience.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001320_ALISAIE<tab>I'm so proud of you, Ga Bu.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001320_ALISAIE<tab>Tu as été tellement courageux, mon petit Ga Bu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001330_GABU<tab>I couldn't have done it without you, Alisaie. Can you help the others too? Cure them, heal them, help them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001330_GABU<tab>C'est toi qui es trop forte, Alisaie, oui, oui<var 1D /var>! Tu penses pouvoir guérir mes amis aussi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001340_ALISAIE<tab>Yes. We can. All of them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001340_ALISAIE<tab>Évidemment<var 1D /var>! Nous allons soigner tout le monde, petit à petit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>Without wishing to dampen the mood, I feel compelled to add certain caveats regarding the viability of the treatment for general use.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001350_GRAHATIA<tab>À ce propos, nous avons fait de nouvelles découverrrtes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001360_GRAHATIA<tab>As you know, reversing the effects of tempering demands a profuse amount of aether. And while Alisaie was able to heal Ga Bu alone, I fear the same will not be true for those who exhibit more advanced symptoms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001360_GRAHATIA<tab>Soigner un subjugué demande une quantité colossale d'énergie magique. Si Alisaie a rrréussi, c'est uniquement car l'état de Ga Bu n'était pas trop grave.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001370_GRAHATIA<tab>Moreover, the treatment's effects are limited to the soul. It offers no succor to those whose very flesh has been altered through prolonged exposure to a primal's influence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001370_GRAHATIA<tab>D'autre part, cette technique ne permet que de guérir l'âme. On ne pourrra pas sauver ceux qui ont été altérés jusque dans leur chair par les Primordiaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>All of which is to say that we cannot save everyone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>Autrement dit, ce sorrrt n'est pas tout à fait la panacée que nous espérions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001390_ALISAIE<tab>Maybe we can't. Or maybe we can. No one gave us a hope of saving Ga Bu, and yet here we are. We must find a way to treat as many as possible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001390_ALISAIE<tab>C'est vrai, mais c'est quand même un pas de géant<var 1D /var>! Prochaine étape<var 1D /var>: trouver un moyen de l'utiliser à plus grande échelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then...the next logical step would be to produce a veritable army of porxies, would it not? Granted, it seemed a simple enough process in the First, but I suspect it will be different here in the Source. Not that I am any authority, of course...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce qui veut dire qu'il va falloir créer plus de porxies<var 1D /var>? Est-ce seulement possible dans le monde primitif<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001410_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet there <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> an authority on familiars to whom we may grudgingly turn. She's stubborn, haughty, eccentric, irascible, laconic, annoying─and her name is Master Matoya. The real one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001410_YSHTOLA<tab>Je ne vois qu'une personne suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment érudite dans le domaine des familiers pour répondre à cette question<var 1D /var>: Matoya. Et je ne parle pas de moi, évidemment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001420_ALISAIE<tab>I have to go now, Ga Bu, but the people here will look after you, all right? And I promise to come and visit you again soon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001420_ALISAIE<tab>Ga Bu, tu vas retourner avec nos amis du Maelstrom pour l'instant, d'accord<var 1D /var>? Je te promets de repasser bientôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001430_GABU<tab>All right! Thank you, Alisaie! Thank you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001430_GABU<tab>D'accord, d'accord<var 1D /var>! Merci pour tout, Alisaie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001440_MATOYA<tab>Nary a word from you all this time, then you bring every man and his poroggo with you. Did no one teach you any manners, girl?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001440_MATOYA<tab>Ha, regardez-les, ils débarquent tous chez moi comme si c'était mon enterrement. Aucun respect, je vous jure.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001450_YSHTOLA<tab>They were too busy teaching me aetherology, Master. Jesting aside, I wanted to be the one to express our gratitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001450_YSHTOLA<tab>Avant de partir pour le royaume de Thal, pourriez-vous nous écouter<var 1D /var>? C'est que... nous vous devons des re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ments.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001460_YSHTOLA<tab>I am told you spared no effort to sustain our bodies while we were away. And for that we owe you our lives. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001460_YSHTOLA<tab>Maître Matoya, vous avez fait tous les efforts possibles pour préserver nos corps lorsque nos âmes les ont quittés. Sans vous, nous ne serions plus là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001470_MATOYA<tab>Hmph. You were gone so long, I was starting to think you'd set your heart on staying.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001470_MATOYA<tab>Hmpf. J'ai fini par me demander si vous n'étiez pas un peu trop au chaud là-bas, et aviez perdu l'envie de regagner vos pénates.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001480_YSHTOLA<tab>It wasn't easy to leave, as it happens. Seldom does one have the opportunity to study other worlds, and I would not have minded extending my stay by a handful of years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001480_YSHTOLA<tab>Si nous avons tardé à revenir, c'est parce que c'était une expérience ex<var 16 /var>traor<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>nai<var 16 /var>re. On n'a pas tous les jours la chance de voyager entre les mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ever the scholar, Y'shtola dedicated herself to studying ancient civilizations of the First, befriending a tribe known as the Night's Blessed in the process. There, she took on the name of Matoya, and won the respect of all the children of the forest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Y'shtola n'a cessé d'approfondir sa compréhension du premier reflet. Elle a consacré son temps à l'étude d'une ancienne civilisation et a même pris le nom de Matoya afin de vivre avec la population locale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001500_YSHTOLA<tab>I merely adopted an alias in accordance with the custom of my hosts. Yours just happened to be the first name that came to mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001500_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est-à-dire que... Ces gens ont pour habitude de ne pas révéler comment ils s'appellent vraiment, et quand j'ai dû choisir un nom d'emprunt, eh bien... C'est le premier qui m'est venu à l'esprit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001510_MATOYA<tab>You mean to tell me you went gallivanting about using my name, and only bother to visit when you need a favor? And don't pretend you don't! I taught you long enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001510_MATOYA<tab>On ne manque pas de culot à ce que je vois. Non seulement on utilise mon nom sans ma permission, mais en plus on revient quémander mon aide à peine remise sur pied<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>Indeed. And devoted pupil that I am, I could not fail to recall my master's sage advice: “When the answer eludes you, look to the wisdom of your elders.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>Je ne fais que suivre les en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments de mon maître, en tout bon disciple que je suis. Ne m'avez-vous pas toujours conseillé de m'en remettre à la sagesse de mes aînés face à l'inconnu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001530_MATOYA<tab>You there─were you going to introduce yourself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001530_MATOYA<tab>Au fait, qui est le petit nouveau<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001540_GRAHATIA<tab>How remiss of me. G'raha Tia is my name, and I am proud to call myself a Scion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001540_GRAHATIA<tab>Désolé de ne pas m'être présenté plus tôt. Je suis G'raha Tia, nouveau membre des Hérrritiers de la Septième Aube.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001550_GRAHATIA<tab>I too wish to offer my gratitude for your invaluable aid in sustaining the Archons' bodies...as well as my apologies. It was my inexpert summoning spell which endangered their lives in the first place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001550_GRAHATIA<tab>Je vous dois moi aussi d'humbles re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ments pour avoirrr maintenu en vie les Héritiers. C'est mon inexpérience qui a provoqué leur invocation incomplète dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001560_MATOYA<tab>Ah, yes, the one bent on digging up the mysteries of Allag. Old Galuf used to speak of you, and Krile's told me all about your recent exploits.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001560_MATOYA<tab>Ah, je vois... C'est toi le fameux porteur du sang d'Allag. Le vieux Baldesion m'a parlé de toi. Et sa petite-fille m'a déjà plus ou moins résumé ce qui s'est passé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001570_MATOYA<tab>Do you have a bad back, or something? At ease, boy! Whatever mess you've made, I'm not in the habit of dwelling on the failings of the younger generation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001570_MATOYA<tab>Pas la peine d'être aussi formel avec ces histoires de manque d'expérience. Je n'ai pas pour habitude de gronder les jeunes qui débutent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001580_GRAHATIA<tab>...You are too kind. I have also heard much and more about you, Master Matoya. 'Tis an honor to finally make your acquaintance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001580_GRAHATIA<tab>Merci, Maître. Moi aussi, j'ai entendu parler de vous par maître Galuf. C'est un honneurrr de vous rencontrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001590_MATOYA<tab>Well, that's more than enough pleasantries for anyone. Tell me what you want. I haven't got all day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001590_MATOYA<tab>Bien, c'est assez pour les pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions. Dites-moi donc ce que vous me voulez, à mon âge, on n'a plus de temps à perdre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001600_MATOYA<tab>...So that's the way of it. It should be a simple enough matter to make the familiar. The magick, on the other hand...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001600_MATOYA<tab>Je vois... Créer d'autres familiers similaires ne me semble pas être une tâche insurmontable, mais pour ce qui est du sang d'Allag, c'est une autre histoire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001610_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, that you may leave to me. Being the only one possessed of royal blood, I alone can imbue the subject with the necessary magick.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001610_GRAHATIA<tab>Oui, malheureusement je suis le seul à pouvoir insuffler le sorrrt en question. C'est pour ça que je pensais rester ici pour m'atteler à la besogne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001620_MATOYA<tab>So I just need to create porxies with the power to stir the soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001620_MATOYA<tab>Vous voulez donc que je façonne un familier capable de raviver l'âme, comme votre espèce de cochon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001630_MATOYA<tab>“Just,” I say, though we're talking about a veritable herd of the little buggers. We'd collapse before we reached double figures.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001630_MATOYA<tab>En faire un ou deux serait plutôt aisé, mais... il va vous en falloir tout un régiment, non<var 1D /var>? Et puis, tu vas t'user jusqu'à la corde si tu les enchantes un par un.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001640_MATOYA<tab>But if I could get a <var 1A 02 /var>familiar<var 1A 01 /var> to create the familiars─a mother porxie, as it were...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001640_MATOYA<tab>Ce qu'il faudrait, c'est un familier capable de créer ces cochons. Comme une sorte de mère porxie, vous voyez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001650_MATOYA<tab>It seems I haven't seen the last of that moldy old hole after all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001650_MATOYA<tab>(soupire)... Il va encore falloir fouiner dans ce capharnaüm...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001660_MATOYA<tab>Right. To begin with, I need you to gather a few ingredients.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001660_MATOYA<tab>Bon, avant de passer à la suite, il faut d'abord préparer les ingrédients...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001670_MATOYA<tab>Listen well to what the poroggos say. Or you'll wish you had.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001670_MATOYA<tab>Écoutez bien les indications de mes serviteurs, c'est impératif.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001680_MATOYA<tab>Right then! Let's get this over with!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001680_MATOYA<tab>Et maintenant, la touche finale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001690_MATOYA<tab>Newborns are wont to be difficult! Show her who's in charge!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001690_MATOYA<tab>Comme elle vient de naître, elle est un peu trop excitée. Je compte sur vous pour la maîtriser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001700_MATOYA<tab>There we are. Quite tame.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001700_MATOYA<tab>Ah, on dirait bien qu'elle s'est calmée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001710_GRAHATIA<tab>Then all that remains is for me to imbue her with the magick. My friends, I'm afraid I must trouble you for your aether once more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001710_GRAHATIA<tab>C'est le bon moment pour lui inculquer le sort. Je compte sur vous pour me prêter vos forrrces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001720_GRAHATIA<tab>That should suffice...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001720_GRAHATIA<tab>Bien... Voilà une bonne chose de faite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001730_MATOYA<tab>Good. Let's set her to work then, shall we? I want to see some porxies. Assuming, that is, someone can spare the requisite energy?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001730_MATOYA<tab>Maintenant, il faut qu'elle nous fasse de jolis petits porxies... Et il va lui falloir beaucoup d'énergie magique pour mettre bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001740_MATOYA<tab>A mere drop in the ocean for the great sorceress Matoya, I daresay.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001740_MATOYA<tab>Un jeu d'enfant pour la grande Matoya, tu ne crois pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001750_MATOYA<tab>Excellent. Our very own litter of Angelos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001750_MATOYA<tab>Excellent. Voilà des familiers qui devraient être en tout point identiques à Angelo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001760_MATOYA<tab>And we can make as many more as we want simply by providing the mother porxie with additional aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001760_MATOYA<tab>Et ce n'est qu'un début. Avec un peu plus d'énergie magique pour la mère porxie, vous en obtiendrez encore bien d'autres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001770_YSHTOLA<tab>I will require a moment before I try again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001770_YSHTOLA<tab>(halète)... Je crois que... j'ai épuisé toutes mes réserves...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001780_ALISAIE<tab>It's still hard work, but a damn sight more efficient than making them one by one. Thank you, Master Matoya. Everyone. We're a step closer to our goal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001780_ALISAIE<tab>Cette méthode est bien plus efficace que de les concevoir un à un. Je vous remercie Maître Matoya. Vous tous aussi, évidemment. Grâce à nos efforts, nous sommes encore plus proches du but.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001790_ALPHINAUD<tab>Distributed amongst the allied nations, they should do much to facilitate closer dialogue with the beast tribes. And given their present travails, I believe our friends in Limsa Lominsa should be the first beneficiaries.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001790_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avec ces porxies, les Cités pourront améliorer leurs relations avec les hommes-bêtes. Et si on commençait par fournir Limsa Lominsa<var 1D /var>? La situation est pour le moins épineuse là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001800_YSHTOLA<tab>Agreed. Though I must leave this errand to you. I doubt my legs will carry me out of the cave, much less to Vylbrand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001800_YSHTOLA<tab>Tout à fait. Par contre, vous m'excuserez, mais... je ne pourrai pas vous accompagner. J'ai besoin d'un peu de repos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001810_YSHTOLA<tab>Thank you for taking the lead in gathering the ingredients. I expect you would benefit from a rest too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001810_YSHTOLA<tab>Grâce à toi, nous avons pu recueillir tous les ingrédients nécessaires en un rien de temps. N'oublie pas de faire une pause, toi aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001820_MATOYA<tab>In addition to the porxies, I trust you've gained an inkling of how much effort goes into the creation of familiars. Or mayhap you attribute your struggles to old age?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001820_MATOYA<tab>Tu comprends enfin à quel point créer des familiers peut être éreintant. Ou alors ce sont les premiers signes de l'âge, ma petite Shtola<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>If I said yes, would it persuade you to treat me like an adult?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh, vous allez enfin me traiter comme une adulte alors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001840_MATOYA<tab>Hmph! Not with that pertness, it wouldn't. Anyway, assuming you have no other favors to ask, I shall be leaving.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001840_MATOYA<tab>Quelle tête de mule... Tu es in<var 16 /var>cor<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>gi<var 16 /var>ble<var 1D /var>! Puisque nous en avons terminé ici, il est grand temps que je rentre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001850_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>Look who's come crawlin'!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001850_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>Sale garce<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001860_BLOODYEXECUTIONERB<tab>Traitor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001860_BLOODYEXECUTIONERB<tab>Ennemie des pirates<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001870_BLOODYEXECUTIONERC<tab>You can shove yer peace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001870_BLOODYEXECUTIONERC<tab>Comment t'oses te montrer ici<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001880_SICARD<tab>Welcome aboard, Admiral. I'll wager you don't remember me. Sicard, actin' captain of the Bloody Executioners, at your service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001880_SICARD<tab>Enchanté, Amirale. Moi c'est Sicard, capitaine remplaçant des Bourreaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001890_MERLWYB<tab>'Twas kind of you to invite us. Now, if Captain Hyllfyr has a message for me, I bid you speak it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001890_MERLWYB<tab>Merci d'avoir accepté ces pourparlers, Sicard. À présent, si tu as un message de la part de votre chef Hyllfyr, je suis tout ouïe...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001900_SICARD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> have just the one demand: that you forget this bilge about makin' peace with the beastmen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001900_SICARD<tab>Nos exigences sont simples... Mettez fin à la politique de réconciliation avec les tribus barbares, c'est tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001910_SICARD<tab>Ours is a nation of pirates. Always has been, always will be. Deny us our right to plunder and you deny who we are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001910_SICARD<tab>Limsa Lominsa est LA cité des pirates<var 1D /var>! Et les pirates, ça vit que pour trois choses<var 1D /var>: piller, tuer et festoyer<var 1D /var>! Tous ceux qui s'opposent à ça sont des ennemis de la nation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001920_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>Too bloody right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001920_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>Ouais<var 1D /var>! Il a raison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001930_BLOODYEXECUTIONERB<tab>Pirates till we die!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001930_BLOODYEXECUTIONERB<tab>On est pirates, et fiers de l'être<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001940_BLOODYEXECUTIONERC<tab>What we want, we take!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001940_BLOODYEXECUTIONERC<tab>On te laissera pas faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001950_MERLWYB<tab>Piracy has no place in our future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001950_MERLWYB<tab>Les pirates sont voués à disparaître tôt ou tard...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001960_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>What she say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001960_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qu'elle a dit<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001970_BLOODYEXECUTIONERC<tab>Pirates...have no place?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001970_BLOODYEXECUTIONERC<tab>Les pirates vont... disparaître<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001980_MERLWYB<tab>Our nation has prospered through piracy, 'tis true. Yet it is but one part of our long and storied history.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001980_MERLWYB<tab>Tu as raison lorsque tu dis que Limsa Lominsa est la cité des pirates. Mais cela ne représente qu'une facette de son histoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001990_MERLWYB<tab>Centuries ago, our ancestors led a failed rebellion, and were driven from their homes with little more than the shirts on their backs. In fear of their lives, they sailed south, until they came to these shores.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_001990_MERLWYB<tab>Nos ancêtres ont fui la tyrannie du roi des mers du Nord pour venir s'installer sur Vylbrand.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002000_MERLWYB<tab>Finding the land occupied by kobolds, however, they were forced to turn to piracy in order to survive. And survive they did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002000_MERLWYB<tab>Ces mêmes ancêtres, rongés par la pauvreté après leur défaite contre les forces du despote, se retrouvèrent face aux Kobolds des terres intérieures de l'île... Incapables de leur tenir tête, ils eurent une idée pour s'enrichir<var 1D /var>: la piraterie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002010_MERLWYB<tab>But not so long ago, when the Empire threatened to crush everything we'd built, we set aside piracy and joined hands with our neighbors. This, too, was in order to survive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002010_MERLWYB<tab>Plus tard, quand la menace de l'empire de Garlemald est devenue bien trop forte, nous avons choisi de nous allier aux autres nations éorzéennes et d'épargner certaines cibles. Tous ces choix, nous les avons faits pour survivre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002020_MERLWYB<tab>And survive we did. Time after time we fought the Empire, and time after time we won. And through trade with our newfound allies, we prospered more than we ever did through pillaging and plundering!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002020_MERLWYB<tab>Cela nous a permis d'être unis et de repousser l'envahisseur à plusieurs reprises. Grâce à l'Alliance, le commerce est plus florissant que jamais, et ce pays n'a plus besoin de piller pour subsister<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002030_MERLWYB<tab>The Empire teeters on the brink of collapse. Ere long, provinces like Werlyt and Bozja and many others will regain their freedom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002030_MERLWYB<tab>Aujourd'hui, Garlemald est sur le point de tomber. Des provinces comme Werlyt ou Bozja sont sur le chemin de l'indépendance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002040_MERLWYB<tab>When they do, our matchless fleet will lead the world in a new golden age of commerce. The tides favor us, and the ocean beckons with her vast bounty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002040_MERLWYB<tab>Nous possédons la plus grande flotte d'Éorzéa. Il serait idiot de ne pas saisir cette chance de devenir les maîtres du commerce maritime.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002050_MERLWYB<tab>But if we cling to the old ways, this great ship we call Limsa will trade the boundless seas for a lagoon! Shall we scorn the world's wealth for a plundered pittance, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002050_MERLWYB<tab>Et alors que le courant de l'Histoire semble nous porter, cette folle idée de vivre de la piraterie reste ancrée dans vos esprits<var 1D /var>? Comment voulez-vous avancer en faisant face au vent<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002060_MERLWYB<tab>Or shall we embrace change and thrive, like our ancestors before us? The choice is yours. But if we are to prosper in the coming age, the whole of Vylbrand must become our ship, and the kobold and Sahagin our crewmates!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002060_MERLWYB<tab>Dans cette nouvelle ère qui s'annonce, les Kobolds et les Sahuagins pourraient être de précieux alliés. Ne pensez-vous pas qu'il est grand temps de les accueillir à bord pour étendre notre influence au-delà de Vylbrand<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002070_SICARD<tab>Rousin' words. Might even be some truth in 'em. But piratin's all we've ever known, and we ain't about to give it up just 'cause you say so!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002070_SICARD<tab>Hmpf... Peu importe tes beaux discours et ta soi-disant logique bien propre<var 1D /var>! On est des pirates<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi tu fais semblant de pas comprendre<var 1D /var>!? Hein<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002080_SICARD<tab>Still, we're all Lominsans here, an' no one wants a war. So where does that leave us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002080_SICARD<tab>Si on en vient aux armes, y aura des morts des deux côtés... et je vois qu'une solution pour éviter ça...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002090_SICARD<tab>Long before you became Admiral, I heard you was captain of the League o' Lost Bastards. That true?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002090_SICARD<tab>T'étais toi-même à la tête du clan du Sable d'argent, Merlwyb. Tu as la piraterie dans le sang, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002100_SICARD<tab>If so, you'd know how we pirates settle our differences.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002100_SICARD<tab>Et tu sais comment on règle nos différends entre boucaniers.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002110_MERLWYB<tab>A duel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002110_MERLWYB<tab>Hmm... Un duel, c'est donc ça que tu veux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002120_MERLWYB<tab>Very well. As Admiral of Limsa Lominsa, I accept your challenge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002120_MERLWYB<tab>Soit. En tant qu'amirale de Limsa Lominsa, j'accepte ton défi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002121_SICARD<tab>No subtitles, report if shown.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002121_SICARD<tab>Rhaaaa<var 1D /var>! (Cri de douleur)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002130_SICARD<tab>This ain't over! Not till one of us is dead! Finish the job...or <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> will!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002130_SICARD<tab>C'est pas fini<var 1D /var>! Le combat est pas terminé tant que l'adversaire respire encore... Allez, achève-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002140_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>It's the captain!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002140_BLOODYEXECUTIONERA<tab>C'est le boss<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002150_BLOODYEXECUTIONERB<tab>Captain Hyllfyr!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002150_BLOODYEXECUTIONERB<tab>Le vieil Hyllfyr est debout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002160_HYLLFYR<tab>Ye fool. 'Twas over afore it began.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002160_HYLLFYR<tab>Le duel est terminé. Tu as perdu, admets-le.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002170_SICARD<tab>Captain...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002170_SICARD<tab>Capitaine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002180_HYLLFYR<tab>Seems the whelps've been yappin' while their master was abed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002180_HYLLFYR<tab>J'ai l'impression que ces têtes brûlées ont profité de mon absence pour prendre des décisions... inconsidérées...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002190_HYLLFYR<tab>Listen well, all o' ye. Since the signin' o' the Galadion Accord, we all of us've been part o' the same crew─the crew o' the good ship Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002190_HYLLFYR<tab>Écoutez-moi tous<var 1D /var>! En signant l'Accord Galadion, nous sommes tous devenus membres de l'équipage du navire nommé Limsa Lominsa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002200_HYLLFYR<tab>At the helm o' that ship is the Admiral, an' 'tis <var 1A 02 /var>she<var 1A 01 /var> who decides where we sail. Was I not clear on that point? Or did ye forget whose deck ye stand on? Nay?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002200_HYLLFYR<tab>Et c'est Merlwyb ici présente qui est à la barre... Personne ne peut mettre en doute le cap qu'elle choisit, est-ce que c'est clair<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002210_HYLLFYR<tab>Then what in the seven 'ells're ye playin' at!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002210_HYLLFYR<tab>Le premier qui s'mutine, je l'balance aux requins, pigé<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002220_SICARD<tab>It's all we know, Captain. If we ain't pirates, what are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002220_SICARD<tab>Mais, Capitaine... On est des pirates, comment vous pouvez nous demander de renier notre nature<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002230_HYLLFYR<tab>Yer bloody idiots, is what you are! Idiots with yer whole lives ahead o' ye! Ye can do anythin' ye want─be anythin' ye want!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002230_HYLLFYR<tab>Triple buse<var 1D /var>! De quoi t'as peur à ton âge<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002240_HYLLFYR<tab>We're pirates, aye... An' we pirates love our loot. But that ain't our first love. Our first love is the sea, the sea an' what she brings us─freedom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002240_HYLLFYR<tab>Un pirate, tel que moi je l'imagine, n'est pas un simple voleur. C'est quelqu'un qui vit selon un code d'honneur strict, qui est épris de liberté et dont le cœur appartient à jamais à la mer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002250_HYLLFYR<tab>So 'old fast to that. Let the brine-crusted 'usk that stands before ye now be the last o' them as knew naught save 'ow to steal, an' make o' yerselves a <var 1A 02 /var>new<var 1A 01 /var> breed o' pirate!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002250_HYLLFYR<tab>Si je dois être le dernier boucanier qui a passé sa vie à piller les mers, alors qu'il en soit ainsi. C'est maintenant à vous de créer une nouvelle ère des pirates, un renouveau des Bourreaux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002260_HYLLFYR<tab>Lad... I made ye me right hand 'cause I saw somethin' in ye. An' I still do. Ye've the makin's of a captain. All you lack's the belief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002260_HYLLFYR<tab>Vu mon âge avancé, tout reposera bientôt sur les épaules de mon successeur. Sicard... Tu te sens à la hauteur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002270_HYLLFYR<tab>Well now! It seems we're of one mind after all! Apologies for the misunderstanding, Admiral. We're with ye, wherever ye be headed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002270_HYLLFYR<tab>Bien, c'est décidé. Mes excuses pour le dérangement, Amirale. Nous sommes prêts à naviguer avec vous sur des mers plus ignorées<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002280_MERLWYB<tab>You have my thanks, Hyllfyr.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002280_MERLWYB<tab>Merci, Hyllfyr...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002290_HYLLFYR<tab>No subtitles, report if shown.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002290_HYLLFYR<tab>(Accès de toux)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002300_HYLLFYR<tab>Yer choice o' duelin' pistol did not escape my notice. Good old Annihilator, ender o' many a proud pirate's voyage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002300_HYLLFYR<tab>Vous avez choisi de manier l'Annihilateur pour ce duel. Dire que c'est cette arme qui aura scellé le destin des pirates... Elle porte bien son nom.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002310_HYLLFYR<tab>Mistbeard's vanished into legend, an' it won't be long afore I take my rest in the depths. Yet be that as it may, the old ways can only truly die when we've dealt the Empire the tellin' blow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002310_HYLLFYR<tab>Barbe-Brume a disparu sans laisser de traces, et ma dernière heure arrivera bientôt. Mais ce qui mettra définitivement un terme à l'ère des pirates, ce sera l'ef<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dre<var 16 /var>ment de l'Empire et la fin de la guerre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002320_HYLLFYR<tab>There'll be stormy seas ahead, no doubt...but I'm trustin' ye to steer us through to the other side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002320_HYLLFYR<tab>Les tempêtes et les courants seront toujours là, eux. Alors, on compte sur vous pour tenir la barre, Amirale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002330_MERLWYB<tab>Greetings, Patriarch. I am Merlwyb Bloefhiswyn, Admiral of Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002330_MERLWYB<tab>Grand prêtre des Kobolds, je suis Merlwyb Bloefhiswyn, amirale de Limsa Lominsa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002340_MERLWYB<tab>I come before you to offer my sincerest apologies for the many wrongs committed by my people against you and yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002340_MERLWYB<tab>Je tenais à m'excuser, au nom de l'Alliance, pour le pillage commis par certains de nos compatriotes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002350_ZADA<tab>Hehehehe... You were foolish to come here. Stupid, unwise, foolish.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002350_ZADA<tab>Hé hé hé... Les pauvres fous de l'Alliance sont venus, oui<var 1D /var>! Tombés droit dans le panneau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002360_ZADA<tab>The Great Father shall have your souls for your folly!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002360_ZADA<tab>Recevez donc la bénédiction de l'Ébranleur des terres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002370_MERLWYB<tab>Aye. Just as we thought.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002370_MERLWYB<tab>(soupire)... Je m'attendais à cette réponse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002380_ALPHINAUD<tab>Now, Alisaie! Quickly!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002380_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie, à toi de jouer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002390_ALISAIE<tab>You don't need to tell me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002390_ALISAIE<tab>Je te rassure, je t'ai pas attendu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002400_GRAHATIA<tab>Let none pass! We must grant her as much time as we can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002400_GRAHATIA<tab>Il faut tenirrr bon jusqu'à ce qu'Alisaie puisse lancer son sort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002405_ALISAIE<tab>Yes, this will do! Here I go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002405_ALISAIE<tab>Ça y est, c'est bon<var 1D /var>! Je vais lancer le sort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002410_ALISAIE<tab>Go, Angelo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002410_ALISAIE<tab>Angelo, c'est parti<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Did it work?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça a marché<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002430_ZADA<tab>What...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002430_ZADA<tab>Haaa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002440_ZADA<tab>What is the meaning of this!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002440_ZADA<tab>Ah... Aaaah<var 1D /var>! Mais qu'est-ce qui s'est passé<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002450_ALISAIE<tab>I'm sorry...but they died by your hand. You sacrificed them to summon Titan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002450_ALISAIE<tab>Je ne vais pas y aller par quatre chemins, ils sont morts, par votre faute... Vous les avez sacrifiés pour invoquer votre Primordial...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002460_ZADA<tab>No... No, no, no... Noooooo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002460_ZADA<tab>Gnnn...<var 1D /var>! Ah... Aaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002470_ZADA<tab>Why? Why would I do such a thing?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002470_ZADA<tab>Comment ai-je pu... commettre un acte aussi... horrible<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002480_GRAHATIA<tab>Would that there were a cure for the victims of the tempered...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002480_GRAHATIA<tab>Une fois la subjugation levée, la conscience revient au galop, et il faut fairrre face à ses actes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002490_ALISAIE<tab>Ga Bu! What are you doing here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002490_ALISAIE<tab>Ga Bu<var 1D /var>? Tu nous as suivis<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002500_GABU<tab>Patriarch. Please listen to me. Hear, heed, listen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002500_GABU<tab>Grand prêtre, écoute-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002510_GABU<tab>The Great Father we have been summoning is false. He only hurts us and those we love.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002510_GABU<tab>Ce Titan qui t'a forcé à sacrifier nos amis, c'est... c'est un faux, oui oui, un faux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002520_GABU<tab>For a long time, His voice filled my mind. It told me to do terrible things. Awful, unspeakable, terrible things.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002520_GABU<tab>Il était dans ma... dans ma tête aussi<var 1D /var>! Il voulait que je fasse des choses horribles, oui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002530_GABU<tab>But I didn't give in to it. And you mustn't either.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002530_GABU<tab>Mais j'ai jamais accepté<var 1D /var>! Alors, n'abandonne pas non plus, Grand prêtre, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002540_GABU<tab>There's been too much pain already. So please, end the suffering.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002540_GABU<tab>Je veux plus qu'on souffre, plus jamais<var 1D /var>! Faut plus que les autres servent... d'offrandes comme papa et maman<var 1D /var>! Faut... faut plus faire appel à Titan, non<var 1D /var>! Non<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002550_ZADA<tab>What...what have I done?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002550_ZADA<tab>(pleure)... Qu'ai-je fait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002560_MERLWYB<tab>We share this child's desire, Patriarch. An end to summoning. For it spells naught but misery for both our peoples.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002560_MERLWYB<tab>Grand prêtre, je suis du même avis que ce jeune Kobold. Invoquer votre Primordial n'est que source de souffrance. Vous n'avez plus besoin de son aide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002570_MERLWYB<tab>For many long years, man and kobold have feuded over territory, pillaging and perishing for the earth beneath our feet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002570_MERLWYB<tab>Nous avons un souhait à formuler. Pendant de longues années, Limséens et Kobolds se sont disputé leur territoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002580_MERLWYB<tab>It may be said that we fought to survive, but what we have sown in blood, we have reaped in suffering, and it cannot go on. I would see us set aside the past and work together for peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002580_MERLWYB<tab>Il est vrai que notre survie était en jeu. Mais au final, nous n'avons fait que contribuer au malheur des uns et des autres. Je pense qu'il est grand temps que nous fassions la paix, une bonne fois pour toutes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002590_ZADA<tab>It was wrong of me to hurt my own in the name of the Great Father. Sinful, evil, wrong. But that doesn't mean there can be peace between us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002590_ZADA<tab>Vous avez raison... Sacrifier les nôtres pour invoquer notre Dieu est im<var 16 /var>par<var 16 /var>don<var 16 /var>na<var 16 /var>ble, oui... Pour autant, je ne vois pas comment nous pourrions cohabiter en paix.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05400_002600_ZADA<tab>Men cannot be trusted! The bounty of the land was to be ours, and yours the bounty of the sea! But you broke the pact! Violated, breached, broke!
